description: Analyze files via VirusTotal thru Red-DiscordBot using the VirusTotal API
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed VirusTotal.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Interested in CyberSecurity and CyberSafety?** [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs).

**IMPORTANT** - Before you can use this cog, you'll need to sign up for a VirusTotal account, then add your API Key to your Red instance.
name: VirusTotal
short: Check files using VirusTotal and an API key
